name: The Legend of Zelda Wii U
name_original: The Legend of Zelda Wii U
description:
The Legend of Zelda Wii U is an action game developed by Nintendo.
The Legend of Zelda Wii U is available on Wii U.
Eiji Aonuma produced the game. Hidemaro Fujibayashi directed the game. Hajime Wakai, Manaka Kataoka and Yasuaki Iwata scored the game.
